text: After the live performance...
Motion
Live performances are fun after all!
...Fufu, yeah.
...I was so nervous before we started

Now that it's over,
I want to experience it all over again...
...Yeah, I know

...I would be happy if all the fans
thought so too...

The audience seemed to be having a good time,
so I'm sure it will be fine

Of course!
It was fun for me, too!
Everyone, thank you for your hard work~

Fufu
The live was a great success...!

Thank you.../ Thank you...!
/Thank you...!

Good job again from me too,
everyone

It was a great stage,
and I enjoyed it as much as the audience did
Fufu...!

Let's use this experience to make the next
stage even better!
Yes... / Yes / Yes!
(Today's stage was really good too...)

(I'm sure you girls will show us more
amazing stages in the future...!)
